[Like us on Facebook](https://www.facebook.com/greencloudvps)
[Follow us on Twitter](https://twitter.com/GreenCloudVPS)

**Why Us?**

- We have been in hosting business since 2013 with years of experience.
- Owned enterprise hardware: We own all of our hardware and network equipment. We do not use consumer grade hardware, only trusted enterprise hardware from: Supermicro, Dell, Intel, Samsung & Western Digital
- Fast ticket response with average of 20 mins.
- 24x7 In-house Professional Support
- 99.9% Network Uptime Guaranteed
- 1Gbps and 10Gbps Network Connection
- 7-day money back guarantee

______________________________________________________________________________________

**Our NVMe KVM VPS features:**

- Latest hardware with Dual E5 processors and Enterprise NVMe in RAID-10
- SolusVM Control Panel
- KVM Virtualization

______________________________________________________________________________________

**NVMePromo - $15/quarter (~$5/mo)** 
______________________________________________________________________________________

- 4096MB RAM
- 2 cores
- 20GB NVMe RAID-10
- IPv4: 1
- IPv6: /112
- Network: 1Gbps
- 2TB Bandwidth
- Linux OS
- SolusVM Control Panel
- Locations: Denver, CO; Los Angeles, CA
- [**ORDER DENVER, CO**](https://greencloudvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=386)
- [**ORDER LOS ANGELES, CA**](https://greencloudvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=387)

______________________________________________________________________________________

- 4096MB RAM
- 2 cores
- 20GB NVMe RAID-10
- IPv4: 1
- IPv6: /112
- Network: 1Gbps
- 500GB Bandwidth
- Linux OS

- [**ORDER HONG KONG, CN**](https://greencloudvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=391)
- [**ORDER TOKYO, JP**](https://greencloudvps.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=392)


**Our Windows VPS features:**

- Multiple locations: 27 locations worldwide
- Latest hardware with Dual E5 processors and Enterprise SSDs
- In-house Control Panel: Start/Stop/Reboot your VPS
- Hyper-V Virtualization: NO overselling, you get dedicated RAM.

As we are expanding rapidly recently, we have several idle nodes that need to be filled up. We have 2 special offers for LET, both have Windows Server 2019 licensed on Hyper-V nodes.
